==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|男|手}}

===Etymology 1===
/wotokode/ → /otokode/. Compound of {{compound|男|tr1=otoko|t1=man|手|tr2=te|t2=hand|lang=ja}}; voicing due to compounding.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おとこで|hhira=をとこで}}

# the handwriting of a man
# the Han script; [[kanji]]
# a male [[worker]]
